name: GenerativeDesignVisualizer3000â„¢
description: This package contains things to visualize results in the Dynamo viewport. Right now that includes a smiley face and comic sans 3d text. ðŸ˜Š Tested with Dynamo 2.10.0+
contents: 3dPreviewTextByStringOriginScale - Creates text in the dynamo viewport from a string, origin, scale and font family name. Also offers the option to center the text. This is useful for Generative Design Visualization., SmileyByOriginAndValue - This will generate a smiley face or frowny face based on the radius, input value and origin. Useful for generative workflows that need scoring in a neater way., ContrastingColorRange - This generates a contrasting color range with an initial value of 64 distinct colors. If the range requested exceeds that the colors will be closer to one another.
